title: Magnetic field - breaking magnets in pieces

content.prompt: If a permanent magnet is broken in half it forms 2 permanent magnets, each with a north and a south pole. Which of the following justifies this observation?

choices.label: Magnetic field lines must form closed loops.
Magnetic fields are caused by moving charged particles.
Magnetic fields are caused by accelerating charged particles.
Magnetic field lines start on a north pole and either end on a south pole or end at infinity.

skill.text: 3.C: Justify or support a claim using evidence from experimental data, physical representations, or physical principles or laws.
